makers.displaymaker: after Eugène Delacroix, 1798–1863; born Clarenton-Saint Maurice, France; died Paris, France

texts.textentryhtml: Roche collection, Bordeaux. Demonts collection, Versailles; Laurent-Richard, Paris (Bought 1874; sold Hotel Drouot; Paris, May 23, 1878, M. Laurent-Richard, cat. no. 17); Quincy A. Shaw, Boston; Wildenstein & Co., New York (sold to Bernice McIlhenny Wintersteen, November, 1944); 1961 gift to Princeton University Art Museum.

caption: After Eugène Delacroix (1798–1863; born Clarenton-Saint Maurice, France; died Paris, France), Crouching Royal Tiger. Oil on canvas; 41 x 55.8 cm, 62.2 × 76.2 cm (frame). Gift of Bernice McIlhenny Wintersteen (y1961-140)
